        Returns:

      • parseReservedMsgIDs

        protected int[] parseReservedMsgIDs(java.lang.String reservedMsgIDs)
        Parse a reserved message ID or ID range string into the single, or lower and upper (if present), value(s)
        Parameters:
        reservedMsgIDs - string showing the single, or lower and upper (if present), reserved message ID
        Returns:
        Integer array where the first value is the lower (or single) ID, and the second value is the upper ID (if a range; -1 if not a range)

      • isWithinRange

        protected boolean isWithinRange(int[] idA,
                                java.lang.String otherID)
        Determine if the supplied message IDs match or their ranges overlap
        Parameters:
        idA - integer array defining the message ID or ID range to test
        otherID - message ID or ID range to which to compare
        Returns:
        true if the IDs or ID ranges overlap

      • isReservedMsgIDExists

        protected boolean isReservedMsgIDExists(java.lang.String msgID)
        Check if the supplied message ID is already reserved
        Parameters:
        msgID - message ID
        Returns:
        true if the supplied message ID is already reserved
